creator: edith@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: I don't think we should fix this but rather integrate the resource module properly.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
i can confirm the bug. the log files say this:

SocketListener0-9 DEBUG lenya.site - Setting parameter [private.sourceUrl] =
[/soziologie/authoring/intern/moxietest2.html]
SocketListener0-9 DEBUG lenya.site - Setting parameter [acArea] = [trash]

 ! note the acArea! the usecase was called from authoring. i've also seen "archive".

SocketListener0-9 INFO  lenya.site - This usecase can only be invoked in the
configured area.
SocketListener0-9 DEBUG lenya.site - AbstractUsecase::hasErrors() called,
returning true
SocketListener0-9 DEBUG core.manager - Usecase preconditions not complied
Assets are not supported anymore, they have been deprecated by the resource module.
creator: andreas@apache.org
